last_episode_to_air.name: Countdown
last_episode_to_air.overview: The players are waiting for the final list of the 26 that will travel to play the World Cup in Qatar. The delegation prepares for the trip. Argentina and the whole world want Messi to win this World Cup.

name: Argentine National Team, Road to Qatar
original_name: Selección Argentina, la serie - Camino a Qatar
overview: Argentina National Football Team is getting ready for the World Cup and opens the door to behind-the-scenes. The qualifiers, the Copa América, the Finalissima and match preparation for Qatar as never seen before.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Argentina National Football Team is getting ready for the World Cup and opens the door to behind-the-scenes. The qualifiers, the Copa América, the Finalissima and match preparation for Qatar as never seen before.

episodes.name: America Cup
episodes.overview: The last most remarkable feat 28-year later. Obstacles were overcome: the pandemic, Maradona's death, and the consolidation of a Technical Director in whom few trusted. Messi has redeemed himself.

episodes.name: Finalissima
episodes.overview: Argentina vs Italy. The champion of the Americas will face the champion of Europe. At Wembley, mythical stadium. Argentina concentrates in Bilbao and revolutionizes the city. The team will seek to maintain its winning record.

episodes.name: Qualifiers
episodes.overview: The tough South American qualifiers continue. The cancellation of the game in Brazil is a scandal. Argentina qualifies for the World Cup and Messi celebrates. There will be a draw to announce its rivals.

episodes.name: Training Center
episodes.overview: Three rivals are drawn to face Argentina for the World Cup. Now the national team prepares to play its first friendly match: the defined rival was Estonia. Messi has an extraordinary performance.

episodes.name: The Last Stop
episodes.overview: It is the last FIFA window for the national team to play its last two friendly matches before the World Cup. The team led by Messi seeks to maintain its undefeated record and is wearing a new jersey for the first time.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.overview: The players are waiting for the final list of the 26 that will travel to play the World Cup in Qatar. The delegation prepares for the trip. Argentina and the whole world want Messi to win this World Cup.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Argentina National Football Team is getting ready for the World Cup and opens the door to behind-the-scenes. The qualifiers, the Copa América, the Finalissima and match preparation for Qatar as never seen before.
